headline: Netflix Makes Majority Cash Bid for Warner Discovery
summary: Netflix has sweetened its offer for  Warner Bros. Discovery  in a second round of bids as it tries to outdo rival Paramount.  The streamer on Monday made a primarily cash-based second offer for the entertainment and streaming assets of Warner Discovery and is working to secure tens of billions in financing to fund the purchase, people familiar with the matter said.  Paramount also made an improved offer for all of Warner Discovery, including its collection of cable networks like CNN and TNT, some of the people said.

content.title: Netflix Makes Majority Cash Bid for Warner Discovery

headline: The Dealmaking 3 – Paramount Lands UEFA Media Rights, Sony & ATP Media’s Strategic Partnership, Apple Adds MLS
summary: This week of The Dealmaking 3 with “The Sports Professor” Rick Horrow features Paramount Skydance Corp. headline: Netflix Makes a Fresh Warner Discovery Bid, Report Says. This Could Derail the Deal.
summary: The bidding war for  Warner Bros. Discovery  is heating up—but CBS parent  Paramount Skydance  still looks best-placed to see off video streamer  Netflix  and win the takeover battle.  Netflix on Monday made a primarily cash-based second offer for Warner Discovery’s entertainment and studios businesses, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.  Netflix is working to secure tens of billions in financing to fund the deal, per the report.

content.title: Netflix Makes a Fresh Warner Discovery Bid, Report Says. This Could Derail the Deal.
content.summary: The bidding war for  Warner Bros. Discovery  is heating up—but CBS parent  Paramount Skydance  still looks best-placed to see off video streamer  Netflix  and win the takeover battle. Netflix is working to secure tens of billions in financing to fund the deal, per the report.

headline: Warner Bros. Rises As Bids Take Shape, Netflix Makes New Cash Offer
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) received a second round of offers from Netflix (NFLX), Comcast (CMCSA), and Paramount Skydance (PSKY), Bloomberg reported on Tuesday. The three suitors are all vying to buy all or part of Warner Bros., which put itself up for sale in October. Warner had set a Dec. 1 deadline for this most recent batch of bids. The...
